flawed_nl_solution:
Todd has $25 left after buying ingredients because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=25>>25
Todd made $150 selling snow-cones because 200 x 0.75 = <<200*0.75=150>>150
Todd has $157 before he pays his brother back because 25 + 150 = <<25+150=157>>157
After Todd pays his brother back he has $47 because 157 - 110 = <<157-110=47>>47
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 175, not 157. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
